content.description: Up the V and pull the roof. Then head left toward crack. Up that and right-ward to the top.
content.protection:
Top-Roping: Can construct a trad anchor at top of cliff. To reach the top starting from the platform at the base of the Enclosure, scramble over left (west) to the arete which forms the east edge of the upper Tower Wall, and perform a trad lead of the Upper Manticore Arete route. 

  Or easier but longer, starting from the base of the Tower Wall, walk horizontally west (left) past Three Bears and Daves Wall. Turn full Right and follow trail up rocky slope. Trail gets gentle, soon bear right off trail and go to gentle high point above Tower Wall. Continue east beyond the summit to top of Enclosure crag. 

  Protection for trad Leading is unknown and likely inadequate.
content.location: At the obvious V roughly in center of main Enclosure base platform.   The Enclosure base platform can be reached by first going to the Sunny Picnics area, then climbing the Access Scramble route.

content.description:
Thoughtful moves on steep slab. If only this were longer - (though several other routes can be Top-Roped from same or nearby top anchor). 

  Up the slab to reach the arete a bit below left from its top. 

  Can reach the bottom of this route by starting at right end of Tower Wall (Sunny Picnics area).   From here, easiest is to climb the Access Scramble route. 

  More interesing and difficult is to climb from Sunny Picnics the Manticore Dihedral route (or perhaps Picnics Arete or Picnics Dihedral route), then continue up Manticore Upper Arete or Picnics Dihedral to base of Enclosure area. 

  . (Sigrun in Norse mythology was a heroine reborn as a valkyrie. Key role of a valkyrie in the battle stories was to execute choices for Valhalla). 

warning: The rock on and around this route has not been climbed much yet, and much of the rock is still breakable and loose -- so the belayer and other people should stand far away from underneath the climber. 

  . . . (Lots of vegetation on this rock as of 2015. Be prepared when climbing to navigate around protruding trees and branches, and dealing with holds slippery with grass, lichen, moss, dirt).
content.protection:
Top-Rope: Could construct trad anchor for Top-Roping near top of the east end of Tower Wall (near top of Manticore Upper Arete route). 

  Protection for trad Leading is unknown and likely inadequate.
content.location:
At lower left (west) side of Enclosure base, about eight to ten feet right of the arete at the east edge of upper Tower Wall (Manticore Upper Arete). 

  --> See on Routes Photo

content.description: A fun little cruise. Â Follow the crack to the top, can't miss it.
content.protection: Standard rack, good protection all the way up.
content.location: Below a crack to the left of the Valhalla route.

content.description:
Small crag with interesting rock and a great view. Readily visible from the road and approach trail -- the problem is getting through the last fifty feet. 

  Just East (right) of the top section of the Tower Wall. Directly above Sunny Picnics area and Stockade wall. 

  The print guidebook gives two roped climbing routes for the Enclosure: Feels Like Climbing to Me (5.5) and Valhalla (5.11). The print guidebook also gives some boulder problems. 

warning: The rock on and around this cliff has not been climbed much yet, and much of the rock is still breakable and loose -- so the belayer and other people should stand far away from underneath the climber. 

  . . . (Lots of vegetation on this rock as of 2015. Be prepared when climbing to navigate around protruding trees and branches, and dealing with holds slippery with grass, lichen, moss, dirt).
